summary: This is a simply mod that adds hotkey for using potions.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Features:[/size][/b]
[list=1]
[*]Hotkey support for health, stemina, magicka potion usage.

[*]Add Potion usage notification support.

[*]Add No Potion Left warning message support.

[*]Add Mod Configuration Menu (MCM) Support.

[/list]Note:
This mod only works with Standard Restore Potions, which restore 25, 50, 75, 100, 150, or all points. 
This is a simple mod, you are free to download the source scripts and change it whatever you like.

[b][size=5]Installation:[/size][/b]

Step 1: Install the Skyrim Script Extender(SKSE)
[list]
[*][url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720]Install SKSE from Steam[/url], or download the installer from [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]skse.silverlock.org[/url] and run it.
[*]Required SKSE version is 1.7.3 or newer.
[/list]
Step 2: Install SkyUI
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]Install SkyUI from Nexusmods[/url]
[/list]
[size=2]Step 3: Install PotionHotkey[/size]
[list]
[*][b][size=1]Option A - Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) or ModOrgnizer(MO)[/size][/b][list]
[*]Click the Download (NMM/MO) button on top of this page.
[*]Activate PotionHotkey in NMM/MO.
[/list]
[/list][list]
[*][b][size=1]Option B - Manual Installation(NOT RECOMMEND)[/size][/b]
[/list]
[size=2]Step 4: Set your hotkeys in MCM and enjoy
